backend/main.mo: Defines core workout types, recovery models, errors, user profiles, and provides a static exercise library for backend workout generation logic.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata linking a deployment-trigger file to tests, components, and a recent backend workout filter fix.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides high-level summaries of key frontend files including hooks, pages, components, and their behavior.
frontend/DEPLOY_RETRY.md: Documents deployment retry attempts and notes backend filter syntax fixes used to trigger rebuilds.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting up PWA metadata, icons, splash screens, and root mount point.
frontend/public/manifest.json: Defines the PWA manifest with app metadata, icons, theme colors, and display configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication flow, profile checks, navigation, and workout validation.
Modal for updating bodyweight and units with validation, profile mutation, and vibration feedback.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders a bottom navigation bar with tabs and opens a settings modal. Handles navigation, vibration feedback, and active tab styling.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseChangeMo: Displays a modal listing alternative exercises and records selected exercise changes. Handles loading states, filtering, and backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with branding, test mode badge, settings button, and logout functionality. Clears cached data and handles logout errors.
frontend/src/components/ProfileLoadingSc: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/PullToRefresh.ts: Implements a custom pull‑to‑refresh interaction with touch tracking and refresh indicator animations. Calls a provided refresh function when threshold is met.
Displays muscle recovery metrics with color coding, badges, and loading states. Supports weighted leg averages and fallback messages when no data exists.
frontend/src/components/SettingsModal.ts: Provides a settings form for user profile fields, dark mode, and rest timers. Saves updates via backend mutations and validates inputs.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Shows a full‑screen animated splash screen with app branding. Displays logo and tagline during initial load.
frontend/src/components/StatusBar.tsx: Shows a sticky status bar with the user's workout streak and today's date. Uses a flame icon to highlight streak progress.
frontend/src/components/WorkoutShareModa: Modal for sharing workouts that generates a QR code, copies the link, or triggers Web Share API.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks and helpers for backend interactions, error handling, and workout validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Hook to request and manage screen wake locks with auto‑reacquisition and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind‑based dark theme styles, typography, mobile optimizations, and safe‑area utilities.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Provides utilities to save, load, validate, and clear workout session state in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/timestampUtils.ts: Converts backend nanosecond timestamps to milliseconds and offers validation and formatting helpers.
Builds ordered workout sections by muscle group, including leg subsections and handling unexpected groups.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with workout history, recovery data, timestamp formatting, and refresh logic.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays workout history with date formatting, calendar integration, and refresh support.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Shows login UI for Internet Identity with basic branding and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/NewWorkoutPage.tsx: UI for selecting a workout type and triggering workout generation via mutation hooks, then returning the generated exercises to the parent.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Collects and validates user profile data, then saves it using a mutation and shows toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays recovery state and weekly muscle group volume with refresh support and loading indicators.
frontend/src/pages/SharedWorkoutPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutPreviewPage.ts: Validates and displays a generated workout, supports regenerating the workout or changing individual exercises.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutSessionPage.ts: Manages live workout session flow including set logging, timers, PR detection, exercise changes, and saving session data.
frontend/src/types.ts: Defines frontend-specific types for exercises, workouts, recovery data, and set configurations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params from query or hash, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and extended theme values.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, known issues, and pending feature requests related to fixing a Motoko text-normalization filter.
